overview: A unique documentary style adventure film about the real truth about racing and putting everything on the line to make things happen. In the search for the Ultimate Rally Adventure, a group of minority racers decides to organize the first true outlaw race in the Americas racing through the most treacherous tarmac and off-road terrain. They experience numerous epic adventures, and a twist develops that makes them head back to Norway. Adapted from the real-life adventures of Hotrod Ponce, the Minority Racer.
tagline: The art of getting lost where the journey is more important than the destination.
title: The Ultimate Rally
